Tito Siap Koordinasi dengan Kapolri Idham Urus Pilkada 2020
01 Nov 2019, 11:53 by Marlinda Oktavia Erwanti
Jakarta - Mendagri Tito Karnavian menyatakan siap berkoordinasi dengan penggantinya sebagai Kapolri, Jenderal Idham Azis untuk mengurus pilkada serentak 2020. Selain dengan Polri, Kemendagri juga akan bekerja sama dengan TNI di bawah pimpinan Panglima TNI Marsekal Hadi Tjahjanto.
"Pasti. Itu pasti dengan Pak Idham dan Panglima TNI," ujar Tito usai pelantikan Idham sebagai Kapolri di Kompleks Istana, Jl Medan Merdeka Utara, Jakarta Pusat, Jumat (1/11/2019).
Dalam Pilkada serentak 2020, ada 270 daerah yang melakukan pemilihan. Tito menyebut tinggal mengatur administrasi soal kerja sama dengan Polri dan TNI.
"Sehingga tinggal mengatur administrasi nya," sebutnya.

Tito Is Ready to Coordination with the National Police Chief Idham to Take Care of the 2020 Regional Election
Nov 1, 2019, 11:53 by Marlinda Oktavia Erwanti
Jakarta - Minister of Home Affairs Tito Karnavian said he was ready to coordinate with his successor as National Police Chief, General Idham Azis to administer simultaneous elections in 2020. In addition to the National Police, the Ministry of Home Affairs will also work with the TNI under the leadership of the TNI Commander Marshal Hadi Tjahjanto.
"Certainly. That must be with Pak Idham and the TNI Commander," Tito said after Idham's inauguration as the National Police Chief at the Palace Complex, Jl Medan Merdeka Utara, Central Jakarta, Friday (11/01/2019).
In the simultaneous local elections in 2020, there are 270 regions that make elections. Tito mentioned that it was only a matter of managing the administration in the matter of cooperation with the National Police and the TNI.
"So all that is left is to arrange the administration," he said.
